column4: Bshad pa’i rgyud kyi rgya cher ’grel ba bdud rtsi’i chu rgyun zhes bu ba bzhugs so
column6: Byang pa rnam rgyal grags bzang
column7: Rnam rgyal grags pa bzang po
column12: A commentary on the Explanatory Tantra (Bshad rgyud), the second of the Four Tantras (Rgyud bzhi)
column22: bod kyi gso ba rig pa’i gna’ dpe phyogs bsgrigs

column3: Yan lag brgyad pa’i snying po btus pa yid bzhin nor bu
column4: Yan lag brgyad pa thams cad kyi snying po btus pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba bzhugs so
column6: Byang pa rnam rgyal grags bzang
column7: Rnam rgyal grags pa bzang po
column12: A medical treatise based on the Āyurveda classic, the Compendium of the Essence of the Eight Branches (Aṣṭāṅgahṛdayasaṃhitā) by Vāgbhaṭa
column22: bod kyi gso ba rig pa’i gna’ dpe phyogs bsgrigs
